name: PageType CMS
short_description: PageType is an XML based Content Management System for PHP 5.2+. Features include modules and plugins, templates and themeing, multi-language support, registered users, macro tags (snippets), a debugger and a safe-mode to block embeded PHP code. See http://www.pagetype.org for more information.
summary: XML based Content Management System for PHP 5.2+
